list_definition.definition: any one of several kinds of pod-bearing plant or its seed
the bean-like seed of other plants

list_ex_of_english: In two of the three villages, nearly every field had beans in its crop mixture.

Nearly two-thirds of the population work in agriculture, growing maize, beans, sesame, mangos, watermelons and avocados.
He opened a can of beans and ate them in a hurry.
